courseDescription: Quantum theory of electromagnetic radiation, interaction of light with matter, kinetic processes, introduction into spectroscopy and theory of open systems.

sectionContent.subsectionTitle: Lagrangian and Hamiltonian of Electromagnetic Field

subsectionContent.title: State with a Sharp Number of Photons 1
State with a Sharp Number of Photons 2

sectionContent.subsectionTitle: Lagrangian and Hamiltonian of Light-Matter Interaction
Semiclassical interaction Hamiltonian in Dipole Approximation
Absorption and Emission of Light by Matter

subsectionContent.title: Projection Operators and Equations of Motion

sectionContent.subsectionTitle: Excited State Lifetime; Lineshape of Emission Line
Broadening of Emission and Absorption Lines
